import React from "react"; import Rating from "../components/rating"; import data from "../data"; export default function ProductScreen(props) { const item = data.products.find((i) => i._id === props.match.params.id); if (!item) { return
Products not found
; } else { return (

  • {item.name}

  • Price: ${item.price}
  • Description:

    {item.description}

  • Price
    ${item.price}
  • Status
    {item.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Unavailable )}
); } }
